channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Counter Box
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Counter Box

item.title: CVE-2024-3481|2024-06-04T17:32:56.648Z -- unknown -- counter%20box
item.description: The Counter Box WordPress plugin before 1.2.4 does not have CSRF checks in some bulk actions, which could allow attackers to make logged in admins perform unwanted actions, such deleting counters via CSRF attacks
